my_requests_description: Track the status of all your media requests.
already_requested: You have already requested this media.
confirm_cancel_request_desc: Are you sure you want to cancel your request for "{{title}}"? This action is irreversible.
confirm_delete_request: Are you sure you want to delete your request for "{{title}}"? This action is irreversible.
request_deleted_successfully: Your request has been successfully deleted.
error_deleting_request: An error occurred while deleting your request.
no_requests_for_status: There are currently no requests with the selected status.
no_requests_yet: You haven't made any requests yet.
my_requests_empty_state_desc: You haven't made any requests yet. Browse the catalog to find content to request.
